DataElement.preferredName: Specimen Prior Abnormal Excision Outcome Assessment Stratification Factor Yes No Unknown Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes versus no/unknown indicator for information related to an abnormal outcome on a prior excisional specimen.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Specimen Prior Abnormal Excision Outcome Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to an abnormal outcome on a prior excisional specimen.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Specimen; a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes.

Concepts.definition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:Deviating in any way from the state, position, structure, condition, behavior, or rule which is considered a norm.:The act of cutting out; the surgical removal of part or all of a structure or organ.:The result of an action.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: Deviating in any way from the state, position, structure, condition, behavior, or rule which is considered a norm.
The surgical removal of a lesion, often as part of a biopsy and with healthy margins.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Stratification Factor Yes No Unknown Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The yes versus no/unknown indicator used for stratification factors that request only two possible outcomes.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.: An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
